mapper.select: SELECT r.report_code, c.r_category_name, substring(r.report_text ,10) report_text, r.target_code, m.member_code, m.member_id, r.report_content FROM tbl_report r JOIN tbl_member m ON r.target_code = m.member_code JOIN tbl_r_category c ON c.r_category_code = r.r_category_code ORDER BY r.report_code DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT r.report_code, c.r_category_name, r.report_text, r.report_status, r.report_content, m.member_id, r.report_date, r.post_code, r.cmt_code FROM tbl_report r JOIN tbl_member m ON r.target_code = m.member_code JOIN tbl_r_category c ON c.r_category_code = r.r_category_code WHERE report_code = #{ reportCode }
